system.description: When you turn to your prophetic tools to read someoneâ€™s future, roll with SPIRIT.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you see vague shapes of what is to come, but something is obscuring your prophetic powers; the future you tried to read is beyond your sight until you resolve the interference.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a hit, the MC will tell you something new and interesting about their destiny.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, the MC will tell you something new and interesting about their destiny.

On a 10+, you may ask a followup question; the MC will answer honestly.
